section.name: Commons IO
section.p: Commons IO is a library of utilities to assist with developing IO functionality.

There are four main areas included:
Utility classes - with static methods to perform common tasks
Filters - various implementations of file filters
Comparators - various implementations of java.util.Comparator for files
Streams - useful stream, reader and writer implementations

section.name: Support
section.p: The commons mailing lists act as the main support forum. The user list is suitable for most library usage queries. The dev list is intended for the development discussion. Please remember that the lists are shared between all commons components, so prefix your email by [io].
Issues may be reported via ASF JIRA. Please read the instructions carefully to submit a useful bug report or enhancement request.
